languages.text: "Не думаю, что они тебя слышат. Опыты гемункула... исказили не только их тела. Их разум и души переплавились в нечто... неправильное. Все это — неправильно. Так быть не должно!" {n}Обычно спокойный голос эльдарки дрожит — то ли от гнева, то ли от страха.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не думаю, что они тебя слышат. Опыты гемункула... исказили не только их тела. Их разум и души переплавились в нечто... неправильное. Все это — неправильно. Так быть не должно!" {n}Обычно спокойный голос эльдарки дрожит — то ли от гнева, то ли от страха.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I doubt they can hear you. The Haemonculus's experiments... have twisted more than their bodies. Their minds and souls have been remoulded into something... wrong. All of this is wrong. It must not be!" {n}The Aeldari's usually calm voice is trembling, either with anger or with fear.{/n}

languages.text: «Dudo que puedan oírte. Los experimentos del hemónculo... han retorcido algo más que sus cuerpos. También se han remodelado sus mentes y sus almas para crear algo... grotesco. Todo esto es grotesco. ¡Debe ser destruido!». {n}Lejos de su serenidad habitual, la voz de la Aeldari tiembla ahora por la ira o el miedo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I doubt they can hear you. The Haemonculus's experiments... have twisted more than their bodies. Their minds and souls have been remoulded into something... wrong. All of this is wrong. It must not be!" {n}The Aeldari's usually calm voice is trembling, either with anger or with fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Dudo que puedan oírte. Los experimentos del hemónculo... han retorcido algo más que sus cuerpos. También se han remodelado sus mentes y sus almas para crear algo... grotesco. Todo esto es grotesco. ¡Debe ser destruido!». {n}Lejos de su serenidad habitual, la voz de la Aeldari tiembla ahora por la ira o el miedo.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「彼らは君の声が聞こえていないだろう。ハモンキュラスの実験が捻じ曲げたのは…彼らの肉体だけじゃない。思考や魂すら何か…間違ったものへと作り変えられている。すべてが間違っている。こんなことはあってはならないのだ！」いつも冷静な{n}アエルダリの声が怒りか、または恐怖で震えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I doubt they can hear you. The Haemonculus's experiments... have twisted more than their bodies. Their minds and souls have been remoulded into something... wrong. All of this is wrong. It must not be!" {n}The Aeldari's usually calm voice is trembling, either with anger or with fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは君の声が聞こえていないだろう。ハモンキュラスの実験が捻じ曲げたのは…彼らの肉体だけじゃない。思考や魂すら何か…間違ったものへと作り変えられている。すべてが間違っている。こんなことはあってはならないのだ！」いつも冷静な{n}アエルダリの声が怒りか、または恐怖で震えている。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “他们恐怕听不到你说话。血伶人的实验……不仅扭曲了他们的身体，就连他们的思想和灵魂也被改造成了某种……错误的东西。所有的这一切都是错的，它根本不该存在！”{n}伊莉耶特的声音全然失去了往日的冷静，她的声音颤抖不已，充满了恐惧与愤怒。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I doubt they can hear you. The Haemonculus's experiments... have twisted more than their bodies. Their minds and souls have been remoulded into something... wrong. All of this is wrong. It must not be!" {n}The Aeldari's usually calm voice is trembling, either with anger or with fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他们恐怕听不到你说话。血伶人的实验……不仅扭曲了他们的身体，就连他们的思想和灵魂也被改造成了某种……错误的东西。所有的这一切都是错的，它根本不该存在！”{n}伊莉耶特的声音全然失去了往日的冷静，她的声音颤抖不已，充满了恐惧与愤怒。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je doute qu'ils vous entendent. Les expériences de l'hémoncule... n'ont pas déformé que leurs corps. Leurs esprits et leurs âmes ont été transformés en quelque chose de... monstrueux. Tout ceci n'a rien de naturel. Ça ne devrait pas exister ! » {n}La voix de l'Aeldari, normalement si calme, tremble de peur ou de colère.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I doubt they can hear you. The Haemonculus's experiments... have twisted more than their bodies. Their minds and souls have been remoulded into something... wrong. All of this is wrong. It must not be!" {n}The Aeldari's usually calm voice is trembling, either with anger or with fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je doute qu'ils vous entendent. Les expériences de l'hémoncule... n'ont pas déformé que leurs corps. Leurs esprits et leurs âmes ont été transformés en quelque chose de... monstrueux. Tout ceci n'a rien de naturel. Ça ne devrait pas exister ! » {n}La voix de l'Aeldari, normalement si calme, tremble de peur ou de colère.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich glaube kaum, dass sie Euch hören können. Die Experimente der Haemonculus ... haben nicht nur ihre Körper verdorben. Er hat ihren Geist und ihre Seelen verwandelt ... in etwas Falsches. Alles davon ist falsch. Wir können das nicht hinnehmen!" {n}Die sonst so ruhige Stimme der Aeldari zittert, vor Wut oder vor Angst.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I doubt they can hear you. The Haemonculus's experiments... have twisted more than their bodies. Their minds and souls have been remoulded into something... wrong. All of this is wrong. It must not be!" {n}The Aeldari's usually calm voice is trembling, either with anger or with fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube kaum, dass sie Euch hören können. Die Experimente der Haemonculus ... haben nicht nur ihre Körper verdorben. Er hat ihren Geist und ihre Seelen verwandelt ... in etwas Falsches. Alles davon ist falsch. Wir können das nicht hinnehmen!" {n}Die sonst so ruhige Stimme der Aeldari zittert, vor Wut oder vor Angst.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Seni duyabildiklerini sanmam. Haimonkulus'un deneyleri... Bedenlerinden çok daha fazlasını çarpıttı. Zihinleriyle ruhları başka bir şeye... Çok yanlış bir şeye dönüştürüldü. Bunların hepsi yanlış. Böyle olmamalıydı!" {n}Aeldari'nin ekseriyetle sakin olan sesi, ya öfkeden ya da korkudan titriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I doubt they can hear you. The Haemonculus's experiments... have twisted more than their bodies. Their minds and souls have been remoulded into something... wrong. All of this is wrong. It must not be!" {n}The Aeldari's usually calm voice is trembling, either with anger or with fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seni duyabildiklerinden kuşkuluyum. Haimonkulus'un deneyleri... Bedenlerinden çok daha fazlasını çarpıttı. Zihinleriyle ruhları başka bir şeye... Yanlış bir şeye dönüştürüldü. Tüm bunlar yanlış. Hiçbiri yaşanmamalıydı!" {n}Aeldari'nin ekseriyetle sakin olan sesi, ya öfkeden ya da korkudan tir tir titriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
